root.title: u.k. monei market give help new rate
root.body: bank england sai provid market assist afternoon bui bill worth 166 mln stg lower rate introduc morn bui 45 mln stg local author bill plu 27 mln stg bank bill band on 10-3/8 pct togeth 94 mln stg band two bank bill 10-5/16 pct bank also revis estim market shortag 300 mln stg 250 mln morn give total assist 213 mln stg todai
